meta_description: String that uniquely represents the method used to calculate energy_total, If the present
calculation_method_current is a perturbative method Y that uses method X as starting point, this string is
automatically created as X@Y, where X is taken from calculation_method_current and Y from method_to_method_ref. In
order to activate this, method_to_method_kind must have the value starting_point (see the [method_to_method_kind
